content.title: 🎉 $400K Milestone Achieved – Let’s Keep the Momentum Going! 🚀
content.creator:
Oukitel Titan
February 25, 2025
content.content:
We’ve hit an incredible milestone—$400K in funding! A massive THANK YOU to all our amazing backers for making this possible. 🙏
  But the journey doesn’t end here! Now, it’s time to give back to YOU with our brand-new Referral Program. 📈
  Here’s how it works:
1️⃣ Sign up as a Booster
2️⃣ Share your unique referral link
3️⃣ Earn 5% cashback for each successful referral who pledges through your link
Let’s keep spreading the word, growing the Titan community, and earning rewards for your support! 💥
  Join the movement now and start earning with every successful referral. Your Titan awaits!
Start Sharing & Earning Now! 🚀

content.title: 🎉 We’re 100% Funded in Record Time – Thank You for Your Support! 🚀
content.creator:
Oukitel Titan
February 18, 2025
content.content:
In an incredible show of support, our WP100 Titan project hit 100% funding in just 9 minutes! We’re beyond grateful to each and every one of you who backed us – you’re helping us bring the ultimate rugged phone to life! 🌍
  The excitement doesn’t stop here though! Our 48-hour early bird special is still going strong, so don’t miss out on these amazing perks, including free worldwide shipping and bonus gifts! Time is ticking, grab your Titan now and be part of the adventure! ⏳
  And that’s not all – we’re excited to share 2 brand-new YouTube Reviews showcasing the WP100 Titan in action! Watch the full product review, featuring both indoor and outdoor tests, and get an in-depth look at the amazing features of our rugged Titan phone. 📹
  Check out the full video and get ready to see Titan in action!
👉 Oukitell WP100 Titan - This Is Outrageous!
👉 Oukitel WP100 Titan REVIEW

comments.text: Hi Pawel, please drop a letter at wp100titan@oukitel.com for detailed requests. Thank you!
